resources.string:
Dear Concern,
Salaam and greetings from EUB!

We are here to inform you that a National Virtual Innovation Hackathon is going to be arranged by a joint collaboration with CTO Forum Bangladesh, a2i, and Bangladesh Hi-tech Park Authority in association with Daffodil International University and many others. 

This Innovation Hackathon aims to connect talented youth tech professionals, students, entrepreneurs, leaders, and innovators with the top industry professionals in the rising fields of new technologies.
